body_html:
Just upgraded to Bazel 0.14.0-homebrew and Command Line Tools macOS 10.13 for Xcode 9.1, whose version information is:

Configured with: --prefix=/Library/Developer/CommandLineTools/usr --with-gxx-include-dir=/usr/include/c++/4.2.1
Apple LLVM version 9.0.0 (clang-900.0.38)
Target: x86_64-apple-darwin17.5.0
Thread model: posix
InstalledDir: /Library/Developer/CommandLineTools/usr/bin

Unfortunately, I still experience the "Inconsistent crosstool configuration; no toolchain corresponding to 'local_darwin' found for cpu 'darwin' " error.

body:
Just upgraded to Bazel 0.14.0-homebrew and Command Line Tools macOS 10.13 for Xcode 9.1, whose version information is:

```
Configured with: --prefix=/Library/Developer/CommandLineTools/usr --with-gxx-include-dir=/usr/include/c++/4.2.1
Apple LLVM version 9.0.0 (clang-900.0.38)
Target: x86_64-apple-darwin17.5.0
Thread model: posix
InstalledDir: /Library/Developer/CommandLineTools/usr/bin
```

Unfortunately, I still experience the "Inconsistent crosstool configuration; no toolchain corresponding to 'local_darwin' found for cpu 'darwin' " error.
